page.title: 01Principal Features
page.content: The survey block contains one large settlement,{Desborough,}a small village called{Rushton}and the rest of the land is mainly used for farming. Desborough as a settlement has several churches, a ballroom restaurant, two schools, a library, a fire station, leisure centre and several public houses. Rushton is a smaller settlement and its attraction, according to the people who live there, is that it is a peaceful settlement. We found out that 3 people out of 5 in Desborough would rather live in Rushton. In Rushton there is a blind school. Rushton has a big village hall in the centre.{ {Comments}from people we interviewed " A very healthy town " " Detoriorating rapidly " " As a teenager, better in the city."
